exceptions.tactic: apply ex_derive_n_ext_loc with (n := p - 1) (f := fun x => x ^ p) (x := x).
exceptions.exn: In environment i, p : nat x : R_AbsRing The term "p" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "R".
In environment i, p : nat x : R_AbsRing The term "0" has type "R" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: apply ex_derive_n_ext_loc with (n := p - 1) (f := fun x => x ^ p) (x := x). simpl. intros y H. assert (Hp: p <> 0). lia. rewrite pow_add. rewrite Nat.sub_add. rewrite Nat.add_comm. rewrite Nat.sub_diag. rewrite pow_1. auto. lia.
